template.name: Template Nginx VTS module
template.description: Template for Nginx Vhost Traffic Status

trigger_prototype.expression: ({Template Nginx VTS module:nginx.stat[upstreams,{#UPSTREAM},peers,{#NODE_IP},responses,4xx].sum(#20)}+{Template Nginx VTS module:nginx.stat[upstreams,{#UPSTREAM},peers,{#NODE_IP},responses,5xx].sum(#20)})>{Template Nginx VTS module:nginx.stat[upstreams,{#UPSTREAM},peers,{#NODE_IP},responses,2xx].sum(#20)}
trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} {#UPSTREAM} {#NODE_IP} responses check
trigger_prototype.description: Sum of responses with 5xx and 4xx codes more then 2xx codes.
